mapper.select: select a.ID id, a.LOGISTICS logistics, a.CODE code, a.RECIPIENT_NAME recipientName, a.PHONE_NUMBER phoneNumber, a.LANDLINE_NUMBER landlineNumber, c.NAME expressServiceName, a.OPERA_TIME operaTime, a.AREA_CODE areaCode, a.SERVICE_SHOP_CODE serviceShopCode, a.OPERATOR operator, a.EXPRESS_lOCATION expressLocation from tf_express_info a , td_customer_barcode_service b , tf_express_service_provider_info c where a.id = b.EXPRESS_ID and c.id = a.EXPRESS_SERVICE_ID and b.BAR_CODE = #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TD_ANNOTATION_BARCODE_LOCATION ( EXPRESS_lOCATION, BAR_CODE, SERVICE_SHOP_CODE, OPERA_TIME, OPERATOR ) values ( #{expressLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceShopCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operaTime}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TD_ANNOTATION_BARCODE_LOCATION WHERE SERVICE_SHOP_CODE =#{serviceShopCode} AND EXPRESS_lOCATION = #{expressLocation} and BAR_CODE = #{barCode}
mapper.select: select ID id, EXPRESS_lOCATION expressLocation, BAR_CODE barCode, SERVICE_SHOP_CODE serviceShopCode, OPERA_TIME operaTime, OPERATOR operator from TD_ANNOTATION_BARCODE_LOCATION a where a.BAR_CODE = #{barCode} and a.SERVICE_SHOP_CODE = #{serviceShopCode} order by a.EXPRESS_lOCATION
